summary: "It's a Wonderful Life" is a classic Christmas movie from 1946, directed by Frank Capra. It stars James Stewart as George Bailey, a man who sacrifices his dreams to help his town. On Christmas Eve, thinking about suicide, he's visited by his guardian angel, Clarence, who shows him how much better the world is because he lived. Though it didn't do well at first, it's now a beloved film, ranked among the greatest American movies. It's even being remade by Paramount Pictures. The story is based on a book by Philip Van Doren Stern, inspired by Charles Dickens' "A Christmas Carol."
title: It's a Wonderful Life
